attributes.action: Close the loophole in enforcing the National Minimum Wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When an employer is suspected for paying less then the national minimum wage and that employer resides in another country in the EU they can indefinitely not attend a meeting with NMW enforcement officers by reason of been non uk resident.

We petition the PM to give suspected employers a one month time limit to attend NMW interview with officers otherwise under legal law accept non compliance with request for interview as admittance of guilt and award such cases in absence.
